name: NFVO Provider Resource Specification
description: This Resource Specification is used to add a new MANO Provider

resourceSpecCHaracteristic.name: Name
resourceSpecCHaracteristic.description: The alias of the NFVO as it will be seen in the platform

resourceSpecCHaracteristic.name: Description
resourceSpecCHaracteristic.description: The description of the NFVO as it will be seen in the platform

resourceSpecCHaracteristic.name: IPv4
resourceSpecCHaracteristic.description: The IPv4 address where the NFVO can be accessed at

resourceSpecCHaracteristic.name: IPv6
resourceSpecCHaracteristic.description: The IPv6 address where the NFVO can be accessed at

resourceSpecCHaracteristic.name: NfvoType
resourceSpecCHaracteristic.description: The type of the NFVO. (e.g. OSM, OpenMANO, OPNFV, etc.)
